reviews.review: Игра топ нечего сказать)) И ЗАВАРАЖИВАЮЩАЯ
dead by NFT. wish id never purchased this garbage game

einfach nur extrem toxische Spieler die man in diesem Game findet. Egal ob Ego Surviver die Ihre Mitspieler opfern für ihren Erfolg oder sogar an den Killer verkaufen oder komplett Tryhard Killer oder gar Camper / Tunnler. Was man bei den toxischen Surviver fast noch verstehen kann, wenn man so spielen muss!!!
PS: zu fünft kann es evtl. noch Spaß machen.
Only been playing killer, really fun, looks like it could be frustrating when you get to high ranks but over all, just throwing around hatchets as huntress is really fun.

This game is honestly horrible. Stupidest nerfs/buffs I've ever witnessed in a game, logic being 1 thing is OP so something else gets nerfed. The networking is horrid, I could've just committed a warcrime against the killer with how well I juked him and then get DC'ed. Its a pile of shite, but I keep playing it and you will too.

[h1] É com isso que Friday 13th compete? [/h1]

https://youtu.be/UrebPl2dhVo
probably the most fun you can have holding  left click and running around like  a crazy person

Oynayacak biri olsa çok eğlenilir gibi, tek başına bir yere kadar oynuyorsun sonrasında ara verip geldiğinde bir çok şey değişmiş oluyor, güncellemesi bol bayağı, alışıp öğrenene kadar tekrar ara veriyorum döngüye girdi.

Ungewissheit, Spannung, Angst und Aggressionen, reißen bei diesem Spiel nicht ab! Wer das Horrorfilm Genre mag, für den ist dieses geniale gelungene Game ein "Must have"!

Allerdings muss ich sagen gibt es zu wenig Killer...
das zertreten der Paletten dauert viel zu lange; 
das Match-making dauert auch zu lange.

I'm really sorry for all the hard working developers, but the CEOs made their decision (out of greed?) and so I cannot support it. NFTs are a terrible industry and I don't care how much they paid you for it, you just keep digging your own grave because of the things you do. Please reconsider this nonsense, even at the cost of losing pinhead, because this is unacceptable.
Muy bueno es verdad que algunos ascesinos son de paga pero los gratis tambien son buenardos
Honestly a really fun game, though playing killer can often be frustrating. With the sbmm being very random at times you often play against survivors who are either a lot better or worse than you.
Devs concerned on getting on top that Cryptobro schlong so fuck this game.

Naprawdę ciekawa gierka. Różnorodność postaci oraz przedmiotów i perków jest naprawdę spora, jednakże brakuje jakiegoś tutoriala na początku. Przyjemna oprawa graficzna, dźwiękowa też (szczególnie smaczki typu muzyka od Myersa). Na minus community, oraz poziom graczy.

Boon totems broke the game. Constant DC's when interacting with them. Some locations are bugged, making the boon totem unbreakable. Game was already heavily survivor sided and now with boon totems covering half the map that they can just keep refreshing whenever you snuff it, killers are now unplayable. Pass until when (if) the devs fix it.
The whole NFTs business is just not okay....not worth spending money on the game at all
a realy good game too bad there is some dc or salty player :/
Да пошла нахуй эта повторная загрузка
divertido hacerle clickyclicky al killer y divertido facecampear con bubba deau 10/10 uwu
Mikaela Reid, most komolyan, rohadt cringe bazzeg. nagyon fogyatékosan néz már ki. Mért pont MIkaela Reid cringe. Töröltem játékot
y’all a bunch of rats. fuck your nfts

"Mein Lieblings Online-Multiplayer! Spiele seit Beginn und hab immer noch Spaß, egal welche Rolle ich spiele."

Tja.. paar Wochen nach dem letzten großen Update und einigen Spielversuchen, muss ich meine Bewertung leider ändern. Als Main-Survivor keine Erfolgserlebnisse mehr geschweige mal ein faires Match. (Bei dem ein Verlieren nicht so schlimm wäre)
Durch den Patch wurden die toxischen Killer nur noch toxischer und selbst als eingespielte SWF macht es schnell keinen Spaß mehr. Wenns gut läuft, bekommt man 2 Gens an, aber meine Überlebensstatistik ist den Bach runter gegangen. DBD ist nicht mehr das gleiche Gefühl.. es ist einfach nur noch langweilig und frustrierend.

Wenn ich überlege wie viel Zeit und Geld ich in das Spiel gesteckt habe, wird mir schlecht. Selbst die externen Erfolgserlebnisse, die Charakter nach und nach "fertig" zu bekommen, wurde einem jetzt genommen. All die Arbeit quasi umsonst. Prestige 100 für nichts.

Aktuell sollte niemand Geld für dieses Spiel ausgeben. Ich hoffe wirklich die Spielerzahlen und Rezensionen gehen ins Minus, damit die Devs die Augen auf machen. So ist es nicht mehr das Dead by Daylight welches ich jeden Tag zocken wollte. (seit 2016)

Keine doppelten BP oder Archive bringen mir die Lust zum zocken zurück. Da muss schnell ein großes Back-to-the-roots-Update her, sonst kann ich das Spiel eig. deinstallieren.

Echt Mist. Danke für Nichts.
The devs are fixing the game, listening to the community, and creating amazing new content!  Definitely worth coming back to DBD!
its ok, I'd recommend getting it on sale to play with your friends because public matchmaking is the source of half the community's qualms, the other half is the devs being not that great
Used to love this game, but the devs support NFTs now. Screw'em.

Besides the toxic related comments and stuff honestly DBD is still fun. 90% of the comments are people releasing their rage after constantly losing. They just need to take breaks after every 2 games or so. Although some are right about certain bugs and Characters but its apart of the game you got to learn to master it.

No 
Fucking 
Thanks

should've seen this coming when it costs nearly $100 to play as *most* of the characters in a six year old game with unfixed bugs. hope this NFT shit drives this game into the ground.

Бестолковая политика компании в рамках бесконечно вносимых изменений которая не дает привыкнуть к сэттингу. Учишься, учишься, а потом тебе говорят-забудь! Теперь все будет по другому. Не как можно выкатывать такие обновы которые просто кладут хер на все твои старания!!!

sobre o game:
ótimo jogo para se divertir com os amigos, engraçado quando as vezes vem uns killers meio lerdos.

compensa comprar?
sim, compre e será feliz!

sobre as DLC:
algumas são boas onde vem mapas novos juntos, killer e sobreviventes, mas outras não onde vem apenas 1 sobrevivente por R$: 10,00 sendo que não compensa...
o ideal seria uma DLC igual exemplo: Resident Evil
pois é 24,00 sendo que vem o killer, sobreviventes e o novo mapa raccon city, deveriam vir mais sobreviventes nas DLC também, 4 sobreviventes seria o ideal em cada DLC, com um mapa novo e um Killer novo junto, com isso chamaria bastante atenção do público e ficaria muito hype o game!

deixem o like aqui pro comentário ser visto por mais gente, abs!
Really really bummed that the devs unapologetically are involved with NFTs. Screw the environment, right? We can all play DBDL when we're dead I guess.

Good game, plenty of fun. Community is generally pretty friendly from both the survivors and the killers.

Truly not worth playing. You might think it is when you first play it, but that is an illusion; don't feed into the sunk cost of this game, you don't have a validate your hours or any store purchases you made by continuing to play. Escape the cycle, better your life, end the suffering, you must not play this game at all costs.
Muito bom, pena apanharmos killers que só tunelam e fazem face camp.

there's a lot of problems with this game, its laggy, it has an extreme amount of bugs (calling it spaghetti code would be a compliment), the community is extremely toxic, there's a stupid amount of hackers, and the creators will happily lie to your face for money, but, if you love a shitty game with shitty devs who don't care about their game, go ahead and buy it i guess

edit: a whole lot of hours later and while I still agree with what I previously said, I gotta add that the devs aren't shit, they just don't play their own game, these mfs have no idea how to play the video game and some of these recent patches really show it, rip mettle of man
Muy divertido para pasar el tiempo con amigos
nft bad and new mmr bad, don't bother playing.

The game is never in a functioning state. It's constantly buggy, and the devs decided to sell NFTs for it before fixing the game. It's clear they don't care about making a good game but rather lots of money. They are so tone deaf and NEVER listen to their community.
They added NFTs but can't move just one broken totem spawn on Dead Dawg Saloon for months on end
